mapper.sql: ID, CARGO_TYPE, APP_ID, COMMODITY_CLASS, COMMODITY_NAME, COMMODITY_TYPE, COMMODITY_PRICE, CREATEDBY, CREATEDON, MODIFIEDBY, MODIFIEDON, VERSION
mapper.select: select CI.ID ID, CI.CARGO_TYPE CARGO_TYPE, CI.APP_ID APP_ID, CI.COMMODITY_CLASS COMMODITY_CLASS, CI.COMMODITY_NAME COMMODITY_NAME, CI.COMMODITY_TYPE COMMODITY_TYPE, CI.COMMODITY_PRICE COMMODITY_PRICE, CI.CREATEDBY CREATEDBY, CI.CREATEDON CREATEDON, CI.MODIFIEDBY MODIFIEDBY, CI.MODIFIEDON MODIFIEDON, CI.VERSION VERSION from ln_commodity_info CI LEFT JOIN ln_app APP ON CI.APP_ID = APP.ID where APP.app_state = '32' or (app.APP_STATE = '50' and (app.IS_REPAYMENT_SUCCESS is null or app.IS_REPAYMENT_SUCCESS='' or app.IS_REPAYMENT_SUCCESS='failure'))
mapper.insert: insert into ln_commodity_info (ID, CARGO_TYPE, APP_ID, COMMODITY_CLASS, COMMODITY_NAME, COMMODITY_TYPE, COMMODITY_PRICE, CREATEDBY, CREATEDON, MODIFIEDBY, MODIFIEDON, VERSION) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cargoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commodityClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into ln_commodity_info
ID,
CARGO_TYPE,
APP_ID,
COMMODITY_CLASS,
COMMODITY_NAME,
COMMODITY_TYPE,
COMMODITY_PRICE,
CREATEDBY,
CREATEDON,
MODIFIEDBY,
MODIFIEDON,
VERSION,

mapper.update:
update ln_commodity_info
CARGO_TYPE = #{cargoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_CLASS = #{commodityClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMODITY_NAME = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMODITY_TYPE = #{commodityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMODITY_PRICE = #{commodityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATEDBY = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDON = #{createdon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIEDBY = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIEDON = #{modifiedon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ln_commodity_info set CARGO_TYPE = #{cargoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMMODITY_CLASS = #{commodityClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITY_NAME = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITY_TYPE = #{commodityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITY_PRICE = #{commodityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATEDBY = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDON = #{createdon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIEDBY = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIEDON = #{modifiedon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
